trans-unit.target: 啟用 COM + 物件建構的支援。

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of ConstructionEnabledAttribute, see the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ConstructionEnabledAttribute.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 如需 ConstructionEnabledAttribute 的執行個體的初始屬性值的清單，請參閱<xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ConstructionEnabledAttribute.%23ctor%2A>建構函式。</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ConstructionEnabledAttribute.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需屬性用法的詳細資訊，請參閱[屬性](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.ConstructionEnabledAttribute"></xref> class and initializes the default settings for <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ConstructionEnabledAttribute.Enabled*> and <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ConstructionEnabledAttribute.Default*>.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.ConstructionEnabledAttribute"></xref>類別，並初始化預設設定<> *> 和<> *>。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ConstructionEnabledAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示<xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ConstructionEnabledAttribute>.</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ConstructionEnabledAttribute>的執行個體的初始屬性值

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.ConstructionEnabledAttribute"></xref> class, setting <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ConstructionEnabledAttribute.Enabled*> to the specified value.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.ConstructionEnabledAttribute"></xref>類別，設定<xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ConstructionEnabledAttribute.Enabled*>為指定的值。</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ConstructionEnabledAttribute.Enabled*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to enable COM+ object construction support; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要啟用 COM + 物件建構支援;否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a default value for the constructor string.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定建構函式字串的預設值。

trans-unit.source: The value to be used for the default constructor string.
trans-unit.target: 要用於預設建構函式的字串值。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string ("").
Gets or sets a value indicating whether COM+ object construction support is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否啟用 COM + 物件建構支援。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if COM+ object construction support is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果 COM + 物件建構的支援已啟用。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。
